title: 2v2 map
body: What map is generally played on for a 2v2? Summoners first or Howling Abyss?

replies.body: Howling Abyss seems to be the more appropriate. 3v3's and 4v4's are usually left to Summoners Rift, since all the lanes would be occupied.

To my knowledge Howling Abyss is the only map to ever be used *officially* in a 2v2 situation (Snowdown Showdown 2013). Honestly, Summoners Rift is just too large for a 2v2 match and it becomes too difficult to juggle the lanes with just two people, you'd be better off with Twisted Treeline rather than Summoners Rift (as Rogue suggested).
TT is a good map for 2v2
